page.title: 15Industry in Harold Wood
page.content: Hidden away between Church Road and the railway embankment are two industrial estates, Bates and Elms. There are 83 companies employing approx.1000 people, most of whom live locally. The companies cover a wide range of business. About 25% are connected with engineering and motor maintenance.Among the remainder are Printers,solicitors,brick-makers, furniture manufacturers,etc. Most of the companies use their own transport for distributing their goods,being so close to the M25.It is likely that more industries will be attracted to the area because of this. At the moment not many companies export their goods.But Tilbury Docks are now within easy reach because of the M25.
